title: [5.0.11] antivirus doesn't work with shared folder in daemon mode
body:
expected behavior

clam to scan file in proper location


actual behavior

clam looks in incorrect location for file 


steps to reproduce

1) enable antivirus app
2) configure in daemon mode
3) user a (ser72) created a folder and shares with user b (ser_511)
4) user b uploads a file to the shared folder

because the folder is shared from user a to user b, the file is stored in the user a directory structure.  clam looks in the user b directory structure for the file and can't find it and thus can't scan it.

owncloud.log shows:

{"app":"php","message":"fopen(\/var\/www\/owncloud511\/data\/ser_511\/files\/shared\/test\/lab.txt): failed to open stream: no such file or directory at \/var\/www\/owncloud511\/apps\/files_antivirus\/lib\/clamav.php#93","level":2,"time":"2013-09-26t17:59:15+00:00"}
{"app":"files_antivirus","message":"file could not be open.","level":3,"time":"2013-09-26t17:59:15+00:00"}


as you can see in the log, the attempt is made to open the file in the ser_511 (user b) directory structure.  it should be opening it in ser72 (user a) directory structure




server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.20","versionstring":"5.0.11","edition":"enterprise"}
linux ubuntu, php5.5.3
